name: Net Promoter Score
description: This plugin sends Net Promoter Score surveys to gather user feedback on Mattermost.

settings_schema.header: A net promoster score survey measures user satisfaction. [Learn more](https://example.com) about net promoter score surveys.

settings.help_text: When true, a [net promoter score survey](https://example.com) will be sent to all users quarterly. The survey results will be used by Mattermost, Inc. to improve the quality and user experience of the product. Please refer to our [privacy policy](https://example.com) for more information on the collection and use of information received through our services.
